name: Arcane City: Saya no Ikari
description:
The EPIC Lovecraftian Visual Novel Crossover continues!

With avatars of the Outer Gods and Great Old Ones missing and universes throughout the multiverse continuing to collapse, Saya has joined up with Chris, Cassidy, Lynthenea, and Mike to hunt down the responsible party, and hopefully 'find' her 'father', Professor Ogai, again.

**Content Warning: 18+, Gore/Guro, Sexual References, and lots of Disturbing Stuff.**

Kiss the 4th Wall goodbye.

With special thanks to our friends over at Nitroplus for letting us continue the stories of characters from the legendary VN, Saya no Uta.

Remember to save before choice points!

It isn't over til the credits are finished rolling! - Mr C.
